titles.title: SUCCESS for BEAD Act
SUCCESS for BEAD Act
Supporting U.S. Critical Connectivity and Economic Strategy and Security for BEAD Act

A bill to amend the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act to authorize the use of remaining funds under the Broadband Equity, Access, and Deployment Program for competitive subgrants to support the success of the broadband deployment projects funded by that program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
